remarks: Transfer two terms of a subtraction in an equality.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Feb-2020.)
statement:
subeqxfrd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
subeqxfrd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subeqxfrd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subeqxfrd.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
subeqxfrd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) = ( C - D ) ) $.
subeqxfrd $p |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) = ( B - D ) ) $.
